get_img_idxs(dataset, is_test)[source]¶

Get image paths

Parameters

  • dataset (str) –

    dataset type

    • kitti2012: All kitti-2012 image

    • kitti2015: All kitti-2015 image

  • is_test (bool) – Use testing set if true

Returns

img_idx (list) – Indexs of test image
